item.title: 人工智能正在加速发展，而我们还没准备好
item.description:
经济和社会影响可能是巨大的。【原文：

The economic and societal impact could be massive.

item.title: 加拿大通胀因碳税结束而降至 9 月以来最慢
item.description: 由于取消了消费碳税和油价下跌，加拿大的通胀率降至 9 月份以来最慢。【原文：Canadian inflation eased to its slowest pace since September on the elimination of the consumer carbon tax and lower oil prices.】

item.title: 零售经纪人利用私人房间避开市场巨头
item.description: 在残酷的美国股票交易世界里，一些小公司想出了一个办法，避开那些主导股票买卖业务的巨型高速做市商。【原文：In the cut-throat world of US stock trading, some smaller players have devised a tactic to sidestep the giant high-speed market makers who have come to dominate the business of buying and selling shares.】

item.title: 前美国全国广播公司主持人查克-托德计划与初创公司 Noosphere 合作推出在线节目
item.description: 查克-托德（Chuck Todd）是美国全国广播公司（NBC）每周新闻节目《会见新闻界》（Meet the Press）的前主持人，他将与媒体初创公司 Noosphere 合作推出一个基于应用程序的新节目。【原文：Chuck Todd, the former moderator of NBC’s weekly news program Meet the Press, is launching a new app-based show with media startup Noosphere.】

item.title: 走进首个星际之门人工智能数据中心
item.description:
OpenAI、甲骨文和软银希望德克萨斯州的网站成为全美众多网站中的第一个。【原文：

OpenAI, Oracle and SoftBank hope that the site in Texas is the first of many across the US.

】

item.title: 关税导致的美元困境助推第一季度盈利增长
item.description: 关税出乎意料地使美元贬值，进而刺激了企业盈利，这是北美第一季度财报季中为数不多的亮点之一。【原文：Tariffs unexpectedly devaluing the US dollar — and in turn boosting corporate earnings — was one of the few bright spots of the first-quarter earnings season in North America.】

item.title: 马蒂-弗里德森说，垃圾债券的风险回报不够高
item.description: 垃圾债券大师马蒂-弗里德森（Marty Fridson）警告说，本月的反弹将公司债收益率压低到了不足以覆盖风险的水平。【原文：This month’s rally crushed corporate debt yields to a level that does not adequately cover the risk, warns junk bond guru Marty Fridson.】

item.title: Nik Storonsky 的人工智能风险投资公司为初创企业融资 2.5 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁尼-斯托龙斯基（Nik Storonsky）的人工智能风险投资公司完成了一轮 2.5 亿美元的融资，该公司正加紧寻找新的初创企业进行投资。【原文：Billionaire Nik Storonsky’s artificial intelligence-focused venture capital firm has completed a funding round of $250 million as it steps up its hunt for fresh startups for investment.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为经济衰退风险减弱，银行并购业务回暖
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）分析师表示，随着经济衰退担忧的消退和监管格局的不断变化，美国银行业的并购活动将在今年下半年加快步伐。【原文：Mergers and acquisitions in the US banking sector are set to pick up pace in the second half of the year as recession fears recede and the regulatory landscape continues to shift, according to analysts at Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 特朗普时代的欧洲碳交易开放边界
item.description:
连接英国和欧盟市场的协议加强了双方在美国转向的背景下实现净零排放的承诺。【原文：

The deal linking UK and EU markets reinforces their commitment to net zero amid America’s pivot.

】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油流向日益模糊不清
item.description:
伪装位置、信号丢失和货物开关使货运跟踪变得更加复杂

。【原文：

Spoofed positions, missing signals and cargo switches make tracking shipments more complicated

】

item.title: 卡塔尔投资 5 240 亿美元的卡塔尔投资管理局（QIA）警告称，私人信贷正变得拥挤不堪
item.description: 作为目前最热门的资产类别之一，私人信贷吸引了中东主权财富基金的浓厚兴趣，其中包括穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.不过，他们在卡塔尔的同行似乎采取了更为谨慎的态度。【原文：As one of the hottest asset classes right now, private credit has drawn major interest from the Middle Eastern sovereign wealth funds, including Mubadala Investment Co. and Abu Dhabi Investment Authority. Their counterpart in Qatar, however, appears to be taking a more cautious view.】

item.title: 英伟达为何是人工智能芯片之王？
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）曾一度成为全球最有价值的公司，在经历了股价暴涨之后，投资者对向这家芯片制造商投入更多资金变得更加谨慎，因为他们意识到，人工智能计算的应用不会是一条坦途，也不会完全依赖英伟达的技术。【原文：After a blistering share rally that for a time made Nvidia Corp. the world’s most valuable company, investors have become more wary of pouring more money into the chipmaker, aware that the adoption of artificial intelligence computing won’t be a straight path, and won’t rely solely on Nvidia technology.】

item.title: 英伟达™（Nvidia®）首席执行官的影响力不断扩大，超越了技术领域
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）将探讨现代科技首席执行官的外交工作。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov looks at the diplomatic errands that accompany the job of being a modern tech CEO.】

item.title: 印度为美国贸易协议制定分阶段时间表
item.description: 印度商务部长皮尤什-戈亚尔（Piyush Goyal）将于周二结束对华盛顿为期四天的访问，他表示与美国官员就贸易协议进行了 "良好的讨论"。【原文：India’s Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal is wrapping up a four-day visit to Washington on Tuesday, and he’s reporting “good discussions” with US officials on a trade deal.】

item.title: KKR 称债券作为投资组合 "减震器 "的作用正在减弱
item.description: KKR & Co.公司称，政府债券不再是对冲风险资产的有效工具，这给全球投资者带来了挑战，并促使他们寻求资产多样化。【原文：Government bonds are no longer working as an effective hedge against risky assets, creating a challenge for global investors and spurring a search for asset diversification, according to KKR & Co.】

item.title: 获得直接贷款后，布洛克投身贷款行业
item.description: 在一系列令人失望的财报动摇了投资者对公司的信心之后，杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）的 Block Inc.【原文：Jack Dorsey’s Block Inc. plans to grow its lending business with the aim of expanding access to credit services after a sequence of disappointing earnings results have shaken investor confidence in the company.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚在恢复降息前将衡量稳定性
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行行长表示，由于当局上调了今年的通胀预期，决策者在考虑今年进一步降息之前，将衡量市场和政治是否恢复稳定。【原文：Romania’s central bank governor said policymakers will gauge a return to market and political stability before considering further rate cuts this year as authorities raised this year’s inflation forecast.】

item.title: 西波隆表示，意大利邮政可能成为数字欧元的合作伙伴
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）表示，意大利邮政公司（Poste Italiane SpA）可能会帮助意大利引进数字欧元。【原文：Poste Italiane SpA could help introduce the digital euro to Italy, according to European Central Bank Executive Board member Piero Cipollone.】

item.title: 中国在关税影响下突击花钱，预算赤字创历史新高
item.description: 在与美国的贸易冲突升级期间，中国政府加大了对经济的支持力度，财政刺激政策将其四个月的预算赤字推向了历史新高。【原文：China’s fiscal stimulus pushed its four-month budget deficit to a record high, as the government ramped up support for the economy during an escalation in its trade conflict with the US.】

item.title: 美国旨在遏制中国人工智能实力，马来西亚淡化华为交易
item.description: 马来西亚宣布将建立首个由华为技术有限公司芯片驱动的人工智能系统，但一天后又与这一声明撇清了关系，凸显了这个亚洲国家在中美人工智能竞赛中的微妙地位。【原文：Malaysia declared it’ll build a first-of-its-kind AI system powered by Huawei Technologies Co. chips, only to distance itself from that statement a day later, underscoring the Asian nation’s delicate position in the US-Chinese AI race.】

item.title: 卡塔尔基金在认捐 5000 亿美元后，对美国的支出翻了一番
item.description: 在 5000 亿美元投资承诺的支持下，卡塔尔财富基金未来几年对美国的年度支出将翻一番。【原文：Qatar’s wealth fund is set to see its annual outlays into the US double in coming years on the back of a $500 billion investment pledge.】

item.title: 土耳其看到 18 亿美元战争结束带来的 "巨大 "和平红利
item.description: 土耳其表示，库尔德分离主义组织决定停止在该国东南部长达 40 年的战争，土耳其有望从中获得 "巨大的 "经济收益。【原文：Turkey said it expects to reap “huge” economic gains from the Kurdish separatist group’s decision to stop its 40-year war in the country’s southeast.】

item.title: 美国软化关税，花旗认为七国集团会议后美元将走软
item.description: 花旗集团称，在本周的七国集团会议之后，美元可能会进一步下跌，因为作为与美国贸易谈判的一部分，全球领导人将讨论货币政策。【原文：Citigroup Inc. said the dollar could fall further after this week’s Group-of-Seven meeting as global leaders discuss currency policies as part of their trade negotiations with the US.】

item.title: Pony AI Robotaxi 商业化前收入增长三倍
item.description: Pony AI 公司第一季度的机器人出租车收入增长了两倍，这家中国自动驾驶汽车公司正着眼于今年晚些时候实现这些服务的大规模商业化。【原文：Pony AI Inc.’s first-quarter robotaxi revenues tripled with the Chinese autonomous vehicle firm setting sights on large-scale commercialization for those services later this year.】

item.title: 法官裁定，前摩根大通交易员被不公平地解雇，尽管存在恶搞行为
item.description: 一名前摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：An ex-JPMorgan Chase & Co. commodities trader was unfairly dismissed even after a London judge found that “unusual and suspicious” cocoa trades were likely spoofing.】

item.title: 欧洲央行 "不排除 "6 月再次降息的可能
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，下个月有可能再次降低借贷成本，但他强调，在没有看到新的季度预测之前做出决定还 "为时过早"。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Klaas Knot said another reduction in borrowing costs is possible next month, though stressed that it’s “too early” to make decisions without seeing fresh quarterly forecasts.】

item.title: 尽管价格屡创新高，中国黄金进口量仍飙升至 11 个月新高
item.description: 在贵金属需求增加促使中国央行放宽对金银流入的限制之后，尽管价格创下新高，中国上个月的黄金进口量仍是近一年来最多的。【原文：China imported the most gold in nearly a year last month despite record prices, after heightened demand for the precious metal prompted the central bank to ease restrictions on bullion inflows.】

item.title: 摩根大通大胆预测欧洲股市将跑赢美国股市
item.description:
该银行认为美股今年余下时间将下跌，而欧洲股市将上涨

The bank sees US stocks falling for rest of year while Europe gains

】
